item.description: Seashore with Shipwreck by Moonlight by Caspar David Friedrich. I have been playing a lot of Elden Ring lately. After investing 200 (!) hours into it, I learned three valuable lessons: Life is hard. Something that seems unachievable today doesn’t mean it will be tomorrow. Explore, learn, practice, and with efforts, and perhaps a little luck, suddenly, you’ve done it. Life is unfair. You can choose to play aggressively, play conservatively, or even move on—just don’t be greedy.
